name: MM2Haxx
description:
An advanced hack for Muder Mystery 2 by Nikilis (https://www.roblox.com/games/142823291/Murder-Mystery-2)

Keybinds:
'Q' to toggle an (unfinished) ESP
'E' to toggle noclip
'X' to toggle Xray
'N' to notify who is the Sheriff
'M' to notify who is the Murderer
'G' for god mode
'H' to toggle infinite jump
'LeftCtrl' to teleport to mouse
'Shift' to sprint
author: Zi
